name: Mars Expedition(updated demo)
description:
Welcome aboard Astronaut!

Mars Expedition was meant to be a game for a game jam, but we couldn't finish everything we wanted to, so this is the updated version. There are bugs we didn't fix, but we fixed all the major problems.

Known bugs:

  • At one point on the map, the display is fix, in this case when you press the escape key while throwing, the pause menu is not displayed correctly
  • The cutscene in the mobile version is completely broken.
  • The controll tips for controllers can be wrong in several places
Thanks for playing!
